```
>> jmap -heap 48347 | grep GC
Concurrent Mark-Sweep GC
```

```
>> jmap -heap 48347 | grep GC
Parallel GC with 8 thread(s)
```

```
>> jhsdb jmap --heap --pid 48347 | grep GC
Garbage-First (G1) GC with 8 thread(s) 
```

>> jcmd 48347 VM.info | grep gc
